answers.answer: I had to do that but i had to stay in the hospital. I do have mild pre eclampsia. Good luck to you! How fast along are you? Im 35 weeks ams they will deliver most likely at 37 weeks.

Oh wow! It's so not fun at all. I'm 38 weeks and 4 days. Hoping to go in soon naturally but if we don't. Their inducing me 11/17, and I'm nervous because it's been so long since my first and don't know how the pains going to be!!! What about you??? :-)

Just found out we are inducing on 11/26 (ill be 37 weeks). Im going to have a turkey baby!! That is unless I go sooner or pre eclampsia gets worse. Im a big 1 cm dilated today! Baby girl is head down and ready to go.
Oh and Im having my 3rd baby and Im still nervous! We still arent sure if ill deliver vaginally or c section. Ive had both. My daughter was a c section only bc she was breech.

question: So today I went to the drs because I had an appt tomorrow but was in the area today. My whole left side (feet/toes,hands,fingers) have been swollen. My.right ankle baaad right now. Well today I'm 2 centimeters dilated, and 50% effaced. Also, stayed at the hospital to have blood work done and to see if I had preeclampsia. Well I'm home and now I have to pee into a bowl that goes into the toliet for the next 24 hours. Tomorrow I go back to labor and delivery to give it to them and have another NST (stress test). The urine is on ice and my bf says "that's disgusting"! Lol Yet he's older than myself and its funny because after I said that, hesays it's life baby gotta do what we have to do. This is so different now that he's all in and excited about his son. He says "this is our love child"! He has 3 kids (17,16,14) and we have my son who's 7 and now a lil man on the way!!!!
title: ALMOST THERE!!
